```{r}
library(INBOtheme)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
app <- read.csv("./dashboard/input/animal/rshiny_reporting_data_ecology.csv",
                sep = ";")
```

```{r}
app %>%
  filter(wildsoort == "Wild zwijn") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = afschotjaar)) +
  geom_bar() +
  xlab("Jaar") +
  ylab("Aantal geschoten everzwijnen") +
  theme_inbo()
```
